1370: Hilduardis moved to De Vyver.B.5 after marriage.
Got married to Jois at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Hubrecht in 1371 at age 22.
1372: Gave birth to Amelgeir in 1372 at age 23.
1373: Gave birth to Pauels in 1373 at age 24.
1375: Gave birth to Thedwi in 1375 at age 26.
1377: Gave birth to Eghenonis in 1377 at age 28.
Lost son Eghenonis when Eghenonis was 1 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Hildeburgis in 1378 at age 29.
Lost daughter Thedwi when Thedwi was 4 years old.
1379: Gave birth to Meinoldo in 1379 at age 30.
1380: Gave birth to Woltwigis in 1380 at age 31.
1381: Lost son Barwoud when Barwoud was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Gave birth to stillborn Barwoud in 1381 at age 32.
1382: Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 3 years old.
